name: Nicolo Athanasiadis
story: Nicolo Athanasiadis has been with the Greek military for over 20 years, rising through the ranks through his skills as a leader and his sharp tactical mind. He was chosen for the BLUFOR mission due to his experience leading successful squad-based operations. While he is usually quiet and focused on the mission at hand, he is well-liked by his team for his dry sense of humor and willingness to listen to their concerns.
